alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Harper; Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 6:09PM CDT until June 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Woods County in northwestern Oklahoma... Harper County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northern Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 607 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Acres to 9 miles south of Selman to 11 miles southwest of May, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Laverne, Buffalo, Fort Supply, Freedom, May, Alabaster Caverns State Park, Selman, and Camp Houston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
